OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD YOGA SCHOOL - EBENEZER METHODIST CHURCH

Desc.entry: Aims to tone the body and calm the mind. Beginners and intermediate, daytime and evening. Also have Post Natal Yoga, Baby Yoga classes and Yoga for Pregnancy classes, see separate entry.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 1-2.30pm (mother and baby yoga), 6-7.30pm (intermediate), 7.45-9.15pm (beginners); Tues 10-11.30am (yoga for pregnancy); Wed 6-7.30 pm (beginners), 7.45-9.15pm (intermediate); Thurs 6-7.30pm (intermediate) 7.45-9.30pm (yoga for pregnancy)
